item.title: The Petrified Child
item.description: Overview The Petrified Child is a supernatural being or deity concerned with the regulation and destruction of evil. It was formed from the mountains, owing to the fact that it is made of rock, and has the appearance of an infant.

item.title: Watchstones
item.description: Overview Watchstones1 are artificial patrols invented by the Sarvaran minikin for the purpose of giving The Petrified Child a greater visual range.
